description: **Added stat tracking for total poo payout, highest paid poo, and most recent poo** Do you like stickin' it to the man? Well how about keeping track of how much he is paying you to poo! Simply enter your annual salary or hourly rate, hit a button, and head to the can. Paid to Poo will then keep track of just how much you are getting paid for that relaxing time away from the desk. Oh, and since webOS rocks at multi-tasking, you can keep the poo timer running while you read the New York Times on your Pre! Then, easily email, sms, or copy your wages to the clipboard to tweet it, facebook it, or whatever you like. With any luck, this app will pay for itself in a poo or two.
